metadata.title: CVE-2020-28017 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Integer Overflow to Buffer Overflow inreceive_add_recipient via an e-mail message with fifty million recipients.NOTE: remote exploitation may be difficult because of resource consumption.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
